author: awiner
msg: Fixes in both the generator and renderkit test framework to support Enum-typed properties
- Support mfp:enum metadata in property-extension to tell the generator that a property is an enum (since it may not actually have access to the class to find out directly)
- Support for default values in the component generator
- RenderKitTest: Hack to (theoretically) support testing attribute values of enums
- RenderKitTest: Hack to support property types that are inner classes (the metadata uses '.' syntax, but the classloader wants '$' syntax)

author: rajith
msg: Compilation fixes. The idea is to substitute the Basic methods with the new Message class

author: sichen
msg: Improve mass inventory variance form to show total product ATP/QOH.  Add some labels for the form.

msg: DOXIA-88:Everything in bannerRight should be right aligned, not just images
